response.overview: When the seaside community of Amity finds itself under attack by a dangerous great white shark, the town's chief of police, a young marine biologist, and a grizzled hunter embark on a desperate quest to destroy the beast before it strikes again.
response.tagline: The terrifying motion picture from the terrifying No.1 best seller.
response.title: Jaws

titles.title: De zomer van de witte haai
